tool.name: PhosphoScoring
tool.description: Scores potential phosphorylation sites in order to localize the most probable sites
tool.command:
@QUOTE_FOO@ @EXT_FOO@ #import re
## Preprocessing mkdir in && cp '$in' 'in/${re.sub("[^\w\-_]", "_", $in.element_identifier)}.$gxy2omsext($in.ext)' && mkdir id && cp '$id' 'id/${re.sub("[^\w\-_]", "_", $id.element_identifier)}.$gxy2omsext($id.ext)' && mkdir out &&
## Main program call
set -o pipefail && @EXECUTABLE@ -write_ctd ./ && python3 '$__tool_directory__/fill_ctd.py' '@EXECUTABLE@.ctd' '$args_json' '$hardcoded_json' && @EXECUTABLE@ -ini @EXECUTABLE@.ctd -in 'in/${re.sub("[^\w\-_]", "_", $in.element_identifier)}.$gxy2omsext($in.ext)' -id 'id/${re.sub("[^\w\-_]", "_", $id.element_identifier)}.$gxy2omsext($id.ext)' -out 'out/output.${gxy2omsext("idxml")}'
## Postprocessing && mv 'out/output.${gxy2omsext("idxml")}' '$out' #if "ctd_out_FLAG" in $OPTIONAL_OUTPUTS && mv '@EXECUTABLE@.ctd' '$ctd_out' #end if

param.label: Identification input file which contains a search against a concatenated sequence database
Fragment mass tolerance for spectrum comparisons
Restrict scoring to peptides with a length no greater than this value ('0' for 'no restriction')
Maximum number of permutations a sequence can have to be processed ('0' for 'no restriction')
Score to use for unambiguous assignments, where all sites on a peptide are phosphorylated
param.help: (Note: If a peptide is not phosphorylated at all, its score is set to '-1'.)

param.label: Enables the test mode (needed for internal use only)

data.name: ctd_out
data.label: ${tool.name} on ${on_string}: ctd
data.filter: OPTIONAL_OUTPUTS is not None and "ctd_out_FLAG" in OPTIONAL_OUTPUTS

tool.help:
Scores potential phosphorylation sites in order to localize the most probable sites.
For more information, visit https://openms.de/doxygen/release/3.2.0/html/TOPP_PhosphoScoring.html
